virtual-sensor.name: Matterhorn_Dozer_NodeHealth__chart2
virtual-sensor.description: backlog health status at Matterhorn deployment

address.predicate: select timed, POSITION, GENERATION_TIME, HUMIDITY from Matterhorn_Dozer_NodeHealth__conv__1950

source.query: select GENERATION_TIME, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 1, HUMIDITY, null) as p1, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 2, HUMIDITY, null) as p2, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 3, HUMIDITY, null) as p3, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 4, HUMIDITY, null) as p4, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 5, HUMIDITY, null) as p5, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 6, HUMIDITY, null) as p6, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 7, HUMIDITY, null) as p7, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 8, HUMIDITY, null) as p8, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 9, HUMIDITY, null) as p9, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 10, HUMIDITY, null) as p10, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 11, HUMIDITY, null) as p11, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 12, HUMIDITY, null) as p12, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 13, HUMIDITY, null) as p13, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 14, HUMIDITY, null) as p14, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 15, HUMIDITY, null) as p15, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 16, HUMIDITY, null) as p16, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 17, HUMIDITY, null) as p17, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 18, HUMIDITY, null) as p18, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 19, HUMIDITY, null) as p19, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 20, HUMIDITY, null) as p20, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 21, HUMIDITY, null) as p21, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 22, HUMIDITY, null) as p22, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 23, HUMIDITY, null) as p23, CASEWHEN(POSITION = 24, HUMIDITY, null) as p24 from wrapper where GENERATION_TIME >= (DATEDIFF(second, '1970-01-01', NOW()) * 1000) - 604800000
